router
Class Arguments

java.lang.Object
  router.Arguments

public class Arguments
extends java.lang.Object

The Arguments class parses and stores command line arguments. The arguments are parsed according to the following diagram: +--------->-------+ | | -->--+-->----------------------------->--+--+->-[ROUTER_ID]->-+-->-- | | +-<-[OPTION_VALUE]--[OPTION_NAME]-<-+

Nested Class Summary
static class Arguments.ArgumentException
          The ArgumentException class represents an error that occurred while parsing the arguments.

public static Arguments parse(java.lang.String[] args)
                       throws Arguments.ArgumentException
